headline: Three Big Reasons to Love Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR)
summary: What a brutal six months it’s been for Monolithic Power Systems. The stock has dropped 25.9% and now trades at $563, rattling many shareholders. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
